channel.title: Auto-lvl99 for n0vaScape & Adminship of own server?
channel.description:
Hi, all.
I've been looking trough these forum for awhile, but never got to post. I've downloaded Novascape source, but it can't be set to get you lvl 99 (or more) when you try to login first time (like MoparScape's HybridScape does). Can someone tell me how?
Also,
I've been seeing 'admins' and 'moderators' in some servers, how can you set that in your own server? (using Novascape)

item.title: Auto-lvl99 for n0vaScape & Adminship of own server?

Hi, all.
